name: Battlecarrier Conversion
desc: A professional conversion done by the Stormhawk Republic, replacing the weapon systems for space for a up-scaled fighter bay. Increases the minimum crew required by %s to account for pilots and bay crews.

name: Battlecarrier Conversion
desc: A professional conversion done by the Stormhawk Republic, replacing the weapon systems for space for a up-scaled fighter bay. Increases the minimum crew required by %s to account for pilots and bay crews.

name: Converted Hangar
desc:
Much of this ship's internal volumes have been stripped and replaced with hardware for a down-scaled fighter bay. Though the conversion is carried out professionally, limited hangar space still provokes a %s percent increase to the time it takes to refit fighter craft. A handiwork of Mayasuran engineering.

Increases the minimum crew required by %s to account for pilots and bay crews. Increases bomber cost by %s percent.

name: Mayasuran Prime Warship
desc: Mayasuran Navy doctrine has a heavy focus on elite figher craft, and Mayasuran carriers feature advanced autofactories that reduce the refit time of any equipped fighter wing by %s along with discounting any bomber wing ordnance point cost by %s. Ships without standard fighter bays do not recieve this benefit. For battlecarriers and noncarriers, flux stats are improved by %s. In addition, extra armor is fitted, increasing armor by %s/%s/%s/%s points, depending on hull size. Due to all the upgrades, all ships are slightly slower from the upgraded armor reducing the ship speed and maneuverability by %s.

name: Mayasuran Prime Warship
desc: Mayasuran Navy doctrine has a heavy focus on elite figher craft, and Mayasuran carriers feature advanced autofactories that reduce the refit time of any equipped fighter wing by %s. Ships without standard fighter bays do not recieve this benefit.

name: Militarized Mayasuran Auxiliary
desc:
This ship is part of the Mayasurian Military Auxiliaries and has been modified to meet Mayasuran Navy specifications. Alterations include upgraded maneuvering thrusters that increase maneuverability by %s percent, as well as a powerplant overhaul that improves flux handling by %s percent and shield efficiency by %s percent. Rigorous drive tuning also increases the ship's zero-flux engine boost by %s. The standard shuttle bay is converted to a fighter bay, however due to the professional methods used, the refit penalty is only %s. With the fighter bay installed, %s extra crew is needed to pilot the fighters.

Other alterations involve the adjustment of the ship's weapon mounting points, generally focusing on improved firepower across the board.

name: Unstable Optics
desc: This ship is outfitted with a heavy ballistic array, however the recoil of the guns decreases the range of non-PD beam weapons by %s.

name: Last Stand
desc: Slows down time once below 50% CR. Doubles repair rate.

name: Joker Protocol
desc: Randomizes the main weapon of the Joker drone.

name: Variable Ammo
desc: Allows the primary Caliburnus Railgun to swap between several exotic ammunition types.

name: Heavy Weapons Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large weapons.

name: Mayasuran Readiness
desc: In a tragedy long in the past, the Mayasurans are forever trained to stand on the look out wherever they are. This ship receives %s maximum combat readiness, doubled when it's of Mayasuran origin.

name: Operations Center
desc: Increases the command point recovery rate by %s when installed on the flagship. Disables the use of the Safety Overrides hullmod.
short: Increases command point recovery rate when on flagship. Disables the use of the Safety Overrides hullmod.

name: Battlecarrier Conversion
desc: A professional conversion done by the Stormhawk Republic, replacing the weapon systems for space for a up-scaled fighter bay. Increases the minimum crew required by %s to account for pilots and bay crews.

name: Skysplitter Weapon Swap
desc: This machine can be customized.

name: Weapon Config: Avenger
desc: The Mega Ultraviolet Pulse Laser, colloquially known as "Avenger" is a massive rotary laser cannon. Taking cues from a Golden Age autocannon, the price of one of these costs almost as much as the ship itself.

name: Weapon Config: Mark IX Rotary
desc: The Mark IX Rotary is brutally simple: a larger and deadlier version of its already bulky predecessor, designed for the modified Skysplitter's spinal mount. The hail of heavy slugs overwhelms shield generators and pummels hull, only losing effectiveness against heavily armoured targets.

name: Weapon Config: Tiger Grenade Launcher
desc: Developed as the primary anti-armor option for the Skysplitter's ballistic configuration, the Tiger Grenade Launcher launches a flurry of proximity-fuzed charges from a spacious internal magazine, equally capable at swatting fighter wings or blasting through armor plate.

name: Weapon Config: Onbu Railgun
desc: Named after a now-extinct creature much beloved by the Mayasurans, the Onbu Railgun does not fire shells like other weapons of its type. Instead, it fires massive bolts of diffuse plasma, with ruinous effects on unarmoured hull.

name: Skysplitter System Swap
desc: This machine can be customized.

name: Hull Config: Speed
desc: The baseline version of the Skysplitter (M) features Infernium boosters to propel the ship at instantaneous speeds.

name: Hull Config: Energy
desc: The Infernium Drive Boosters were redirected to restore the Skysplitter's original extra energy capacitors, giving this purple-clad battlecruiser a fierce bite.

name: Hull Config: Overdriven
desc: This Skysplitter variant features the removal of many systems designed to regulate its power grid. The extra speed and maneuverability make it a favourite among aggressive Mayasuran officers.

name: Hull Config: Ballistic
desc: With the spinal energy systems replaced with massive ammo loaders and shell handling equipment, this Skysplitter features enough ballistic firepower to stand in the Hegemony battleline, if not for its Mayasuran livery.

name: Hull Config: Burn
desc: The baseline version of the Victory (M) features the standard Burn Drive to propel this battleship at great speeds.

name: Hull Config: Speed
desc: The fastest variant of the Victory (M) wields plasma jets with terrifying power, allowing it to close the gap quickly.

name: Hull Config: Energy
desc: This Victory (M) features all of its power focused on giving the twin Avengers extra attacking power in exchange for its speed.

name: Hull Config: Stealth
desc: The stealthiest version of the Victory (M) has an onboard mine displacer, allowing sneaky captains to exploit enemy ships out of formation.

name: Victory System Swap
desc: This machine can be customized.

name: Winghead System Swap
desc: This machine can be customized.

name: Hull Config: Speed
desc: The baseline version of the Winghead (M) comes equipped with Infernium Burn for aggressive pushes.

name: Hull Config: Energy
desc: This version of the Winghead (M) has High Energy Focus for on demand burst damage.

name: Hull Config: Ballistic
desc: This Winghead (M) has an Accelerated Ammo Feeder for a ballistics focused offense.

name: Hull Config: Missile
desc: The Winghead (M) swaps its ballistic firepower for missiles and Fast Missile Racks.
